name: Python Basics
description: Introduction to Python syntax and basic programming concepts.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Understanding Python variables, primitive data types, and type conversion.

lessons.name: Control Structures
lessons.description: Conditional statements, loops, and flow control in Python.

lessons.name: Functions and Modules
lessons.description: Writing reusable code with functions and organizing code with modules.

name: Data Structures in Python
description: Understanding Python's built-in data structures and their applications.

lessons.name: Lists and Tuples
lessons.description: Working with sequence data types in Python.

lessons.name: Dictionaries and Sets
lessons.description: Using mapping and unordered collection types in Python.

lessons.name: Advanced Data Manipulation
lessons.description: List comprehensions, slicing, and advanced operations on collections.

name: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Introduction to object-oriented programming concepts in Python.

lessons.name: Classes and Objects
lessons.description: Creating and using classes and objects in Python.

lessons.name: Inheritance and Polymorphism
lessons.description: Understanding OOP relationships and method overriding.

lessons.name: Advanced OOP Concepts
lessons.description: Magic methods, encapsulation, and design patterns in Python.

name: Logic and Proofs
description: Fundamentals of mathematical logic and proof techniques.

lessons.name: Propositional Logic
lessons.description: Understanding logical operators, truth tables, and logical equivalences.

lessons.name: Predicate Logic
lessons.description: Working with quantifiers, predicates, and logical inference.

lessons.name: Proof Techniques
lessons.description: Direct proofs, contradiction, induction, and other proof methods.

lessons.name: Set Theory
lessons.description: Operations on sets, set properties, and set identities.

lessons.name: Relations
lessons.description: Binary relations, equivalence relations, and partial orders.

lessons.name: Functions
lessons.description: Types of functions, composition, and function properties.

name: Java Fundamentals
description: Introduction to Java programming language and environment.

lessons.name: Java Syntax and Environment
lessons.description: Setting up Java, understanding syntax, and basic constructs.

lessons.name: Java Classes and Objects
lessons.description: Creating classes, methods, and constructors in Java.

lessons.name: Packages and Access Control
lessons.description: Organizing code with packages and controlling access to members.

name: Design Patterns
description: Common design patterns and their implementation in Java.

lessons.name: Creational Patterns
lessons.description: Singleton, Factory Method, Abstract Factory, and Builder patterns.

lessons.name: Structural Patterns
lessons.description: Adapter, Decorator, Composite, and Facade patterns.

lessons.name: Behavioral Patterns
lessons.description: Observer, Strategy, Command, and Template Method patterns.

name: Front-End Development
description: Building user interfaces with React and modern front-end technologies.

lessons.name: HTML and CSS Fundamentals
lessons.description: Modern HTML5 and CSS3 techniques for responsive web design.

lessons.name: JavaScript and DOM Manipulation
lessons.description: Using JavaScript to create dynamic web content and manipulate the DOM.

lessons.name: React Components and State
lessons.description: Building interactive UIs using React's component architecture.

name: Back-End Development
description: Server-side programming with Node.js and Express.

lessons.name: Node.js Fundamentals
lessons.description: Getting started with Node.js ecosystem and npm.

lessons.name: Express Framework
lessons.description: Building RESTful APIs with Express.js.

lessons.name: Database Integration
lessons.description: Connecting web applications to MongoDB using Mongoose.
